dct_description_sm: entw. u. gez. v. F. Handtke.
Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.
Prime meridians: Island de Fer; Paris.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Deutsche Meilen" and "Englische Meilen."
Shows topography, drainage, state and territorial boundaries, railroads, canals, cities and towns, marshlands, and areas of Native American habitation.
Includes index, legend, and table listing states with number of counties, area dimensions, population.
